name: Pasta with Creamy Smoked Salmon and Dill
author: Al Mccready
summary: This is a tasty pasta recipe made with home-smoked salmon. Use your favorite pasta shape.
directions: Fill a large pot with water
Add sea salt to taste, and bring to a rolling boil
Stir in penne and return to a boil
Cook uncovered, stirring occasionally, until pasta is cooked through but still firm to the bite, about 11 minutes
Drain penne well, and reserve 1 cup of pasta cooking water
Return penne and reserved cup of pasta water to the empty pot and place over medium-low heat
Stir smoked salmon, cream cheese, dill, green onions, Dijon mustard, lemon zest, lemon juice, and black pepper into pasta until cream cheese is melted, 4 to 5 minutes
